caption.p: EcML transiently induces systemic inflammatory responses after vaccination. C57BL/6 mice (at least 3 mice per group) were i.m. immunized in tibialis anterior with PBS, 10 µg OVA protein alone or in combination with either 2.5 µg EcML or 2.5 µg MPL. ( A) The body temperature was measured using a rectal probe. ( B) Heat map of the inflammatory cytokine levels in the sera of the vaccinated mice as measured using a Legendplex immunoassay kit. The data are representative of three independent experiments.
